category: news
title: "These festively dressed llamas helped ease stressed holiday travelers at this airport"
excerpt: "Prince and Benny, who are therapy animals, visited the Portland International Airport on Monday. The llamas were even dressed in festive outfits. \"It can be a stressful time of year to travel. So getting a a llama hug can kind of alleviate all the tension,\" Shannon Joy, of Mountain Peaks Therapy Llamas & Alpacas, told KATU."
